00087             {
00088                   try
00089                   {

00124             function                get_by_id( $id )
00125             {
00126                   try
00127                   {
00128                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00129                         
00130                         $Records = $this->ContentAccess->unsafe_select( $this->ContentAccess->NativeTable.".id = $id" );
00131                         
00132                         if( count( $Records ) == 0 )
00133                         {
00134                               throw( new Exception( 'Record was not found' ) );
00135                         }
00136                         
00137                         return( $Records[ 0 ] );
